CardConfigs.MetaData: {"Equipment": "Head","EquipmentDescription": "+1 battle power", "Name": "Mask of the Eastern Beast", "Description": "A frightening appearance will help you avoid a dangerous battle" }
{"Equipment": "Head","EquipmentDescription": "+3 battle power", "Name": "Knight's helmet ", "Description": "My head is safe, but where am I going?" }
{"Equipment": "Head","EquipmentDescription": "+1 to combat strength", "Name": "Plug-hat", "Description": "Left over from a visit from a strange guy who suddenly disappeared into thin air" }
{"Equipment": "Head","EquipmentDescription": "+1 to combat strength", "Name": "Fashionable wig", "Description": "And let the poor envy your appearance" }
{"Equipment": "Chest","EquipmentDescription": "+1 battle power", "Name": "Barbarian Hero's Cuirass", "Description": "The former owner was insane and loved to drink blood from skulls" }
{"Equipment": "Chest","EquipmentDescription": "+3 battle power", "Name": "Armor from the East", "Description": "Strange armor but looks light and strong" }
{"Equipment": "Chest","EquipmentDescription": "+3 battle power", "Name": "Knight's cuirass", "Description": "There's a hole in the back from a crossbow bolt, but it looks brand new." }

{"Equipment": "Chest","EquipmentDescription": "+3 battle power", "Name": "Mercenary armor", "Description": "To escape with the loot you need to run fast. A pile of metal on your chest will only get in the way" }
{"Equipment": "Legs","EquipmentDescription": "+3 battle power", "Name": "Rider's boots", "Description": "Good comfortable shoes for all conditions" }
{"Equipment": "Legs","EquipmentDescription": "+3 battle power", "Name": "Knight's boots", "Description": "Shoes of an experienced warrior. Will protect from a shot to the knee" }
{"Equipment": "Legs","EquipmentDescription": "+3 battle power", "Name": "Monk's Sandals", "Description": "The wearer of this shoe is wiser than the shoe. Or at least tries to appear so." }
{"Equipment": "Legs","EquipmentDescription": "+3 battle power", "Name": "Aristocrat's shoes", "Description": "Shoes expensive enough to pass for rich" }
{"Equipment": "Legs","EquipmentDescription": "+3 battle power", "Name": "Bandit Boots", "Description": "I hope this is dried tomato sauce stain" }
{"Equipment": "Hands","EquipmentDescription": "+3 battle power", "Name": "Knight's gloves", "Description": "A heavy hand that can drive nails with a blow" }
{"Equipment": "Hands","EquipmentDescription": "+3 battle power", "Name": "Thief gloves", "Description": "Meant to leave no trace" }
{"Equipment": "Hands","EquipmentDescription": "+3 battle power", "Name": "Blacksmith's gloves", "Description": "The heavy-handed tool of the creator" }
